description: Bookmarks ongoing events and more so you do not have to and provides bookmarks to the most useful sections.
name: gbf-bookmarker

scripts.build: rimraf dist && yarn copy-build-folders && rimraf dist/**/*.scss && rimraf dist/**/*.css.map && rimraf dist/**/*.md
scripts.copy-build-folders: rimraf dist && mkdir dist && cp -r assets dist/assets && cp -r src dist/src && cp -r vendor dist/vendor
scripts.push-to-master: git checkout master && git merge develop && git push
